featured.text: But Dumas overcame poverty, the lack of formal education, and the hardship of racism to become one of the world’s most popular writers.
We want to believe in magic powers, good friends, and the power of good to overcome evil.
In the earlier days of space travel, scientists tried to overcome the force of gravity so that a rocket could shoot 16 Earth’s pull in order to land humans on the moon.

definition.en_def: To succeed in dealing with a problem or difficulty.
definition.example: She was able to overcome her fears and speak in public.
